SkyView.python:
import requests
response = requests.get(
    'https://skyview.gsfc.nasa.gov/cgi-bin/images',
    params={
        'Position': '85.2479,-2.4583',
        'Survey': 'DSS2 Red',
        'Pixels': '1000,1000',
        'Size': 0.5,
        'Return': 'FITS'
    }
)
fits_data = response.content
